feature_extractor module

Feature extraction module for network flows. Extracts features from packets and aggregates them into flow-based features for ML prediction.

class feature_extractor.FlowFeatureExtractor(flow_timeout: int = 120, max_packets_per_flow: int = 100)[source]

Bases: object

Extracts features from network packets and flows for ML prediction.

flow_timeout

Time in seconds before flow is considered expired.

Type:

int

max_packets_per_flow

Maximum packets to store per flow.

Type:

int

flow_stats

Statistics for each flow.

Type:

dict

last_packet_time

Last packet timestamp for each flow.

Type:

dict

packet_buffer

Circular buffer for packet features per flow.

Type:

dict

create_flow_key(packet_info: Dict[str, Any]) → str | None[source]

Create unique flow key from packet information.

Parameters:

packet_info – Dictionary containing packet information.

Returns:

Flow key string or None if packet doesn’t have required info.

extract_packet_features(packet_info: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Extract features from a single packet.

Parameters:

packet_info – Dictionary containing packet information.

Returns:

Dictionary with packet features.

get_all_flow_keys() → List[str][source]

Get list of all active flow keys.

get_flow_count() → int[source]

Get number of active flows.

get_flow_features(flow_key: str) → List[float] | None[source]

Extract ML features from flow statistics.

Parameters:

flow_key – Unique flow identifier.

Returns:

List of feature values for ML model (78 features based on CIC-IDS2017).

reset_flow(flow_key: str)[source]

Reset flow statistics after prediction.

update_flow_stats(flow_key: str, packet_features: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Update flow statistics with new packet.

Parameters:

  • flow_key – Unique flow identifier.

  • packet_features – Features of the current packet.

Returns:

Updated flow statistics.
